DSI.desc: 1 if claimed as dependent on another return; otherwise 0

EIC.desc: number of EIC qualifying children (range: 0 to 3)

FLPDYR.desc: Calendar year for which taxes are calculated

MARS.desc: Filing (marital) status: line number of the checked box [1=single, 2=joint, 3=separate, 4=household-head, 5=widow(er)]

MIDR.desc: 1 if separately filing spouse itemizes; otherwise 0

RECID.desc: Unique numeric identifier for filing unit; appears as RECID variable in tc CLI minimal output

XTOT.desc: Total number of exemptions for filing unit

age_head.desc: Age in years of taxpayer (i.e. primary adult)

age_spouse.desc: Age in years of spouse (i.e. secondary adult if present)

agi_bin.desc: Historical AGI category used in data extrapolation

cmbtp.desc: Estimate of income on (AMT) Form 6251 but not in AGI

e00200.desc: Wages, salaries, and tips for filing unit net of pension contributions

e00200p.desc: Wages, salaries, and tips for taxpayer net of pension contributions (pencon_p)

e00200s.desc: Wages, salaries, and tips for spouse net of pension contributions (pencon_s)

pencon_p.desc: Contributions to defined-contribution pension plans for taxpayer

form.2013-2016: Imputed using IRS tabulations of Form W-2 sample

pencon_s.desc: Contributions to defined-contribution pension plans for spouse

form.2013-2016: Imputed using IRS tabulations of Form W-2 sample

e00650.desc: Qualified dividends included in ordinary dividends

e00700.desc: Taxable refunds of state and local income taxes

e00900.desc: Sch C business net profit/loss for filing unit

e00900p.desc: Sch C business net profit/loss for taxpayer

e00900s.desc: Sch C business net profit/loss for spouse

e01100.desc: Capital gain distributions not reported on Sch D

e02000.desc: Sch E total rental, royalty, partnership, S-corporation, etc, income/loss (includes e26270 and e27200)

e02100.desc: Farm net income/loss for filing unit from Sch F

e03290.desc: Health savings account deduction from Form 8889

e03300.desc: Contributions to SEP, SIMPLE and qualified plans

e03400.desc: Penalty on early withdrawal of savings

e07240.desc: Retirement savings contributions credit from Form 8880

e07600.desc: Prior year minimum tax credit from Form 8801

e09800.desc: Unreported payroll taxes from Form 4137 or 8919

e09900.desc: Penalty tax on qualified retirement plans

e17500.desc: Itemizable medical and dental expenses.  WARNING: this variable is zero below the floor in PUF data.

e18400.desc: Itemizable state and local income/sales taxes

e19800.desc: Itemizable charitable giving: cash/check contributions.  WARNING: this variable is already capped in PUF data.

e20100.desc: Itemizable charitable giving: other than cash/check contributions.  WARNING: this variable is already capped in PUF data.

e20400.desc: Itemizable miscellaneous deductions.  WARNING: this variable is zero below the floor in PUF data.

g20500.desc: Itemizable gross (before 10% AGI disregard) casualty or theft loss

form.2013-2016: 1040 Sch A line 20 before disregard subtracted

e24518.desc: Sch D: 28% Rate Gain or Loss

e26270.desc: Sch E: Combined partnership and S-corporation net income/loss (includes k1bx14p and k1bx14s amounts and is included in e02000)

e27200.desc: Sch E: Farm rent net income or loss (included in e02000)

e32800.desc: Child/dependent-care expenses for qualifying persons from Form 2441

e58990.desc: Investment income elected amount from Form 4952

e62900.desc: Alternative Minimum Tax foreign tax credit from Form 6251

e87530.desc: Adjusted qualified lifetime learning expenses for all students

form.2013-2016: 8863 Part I line 10 and 8863 Part III line 31

elderly_dependents.desc: number of dependents age 65+ in filing unit excluding taxpayer and spouse

form.2013-2016: imputed from CPS data; not used in tax law

f6251.desc: 1 if Form 6251 (AMT) attached to return; otherwise 0

a_lineno.desc: CPS line number for the person record of the head of the tax filing unit (not used in tax-calculation logic)

ffpos.desc: CPS family identifier within household (not used in tax-calculation logic)

fips.desc: FIPS state code (not used in tax-calculation logic)

h_seq.desc: CPS household sequence number (not used in tax-calculation logic)

data_source.desc: 1 if unit is created primarily from IRS-SOI PUF data; 0 if created primarily from CPS data (not used in tax-calculation logic)

k1bx14p.desc: Partner self-employment earnings/loss for taxpayer (included in e26270 total)

k1bx14s.desc: Partner self-employment earnings/loss for spouse (included in e26270 total)

mcaid_ben.desc: Imputed Medicaid benefits expressed as the actuarial value of Medicaid health insurance

mcare_ben.desc: Imputed Medicare benefits expressed as the actuarial value of Medicare health insurance

n24.desc: Number of children who are Child-Tax-Credit eligible, one condition for which is being under age 17

nu06.desc: Number of dependents under 6 years old

nu13.desc: Number of dependents under 13 years old

nu18.desc: Number of people under 18 years old in the filing unit

n1820.desc: Number of people age 18-20 years old in the filing unit

n21.desc: Number of people 21 years old or older in the filing unit

form.2014-20??: determined using government benefit program data

p08000.desc: Other tax credits (but not including Sch R credit)

p22250.desc: Sch D: Net short-term capital gains/losses

p23250.desc: Sch D: Net long-term capital gains/losses

e87521.desc: Total tentative AmOppCredit amount for all students

form.2013-2016: 8863 Part I line 1 and 8863 Part III line 30

s006.desc: Filing unit sampling weight; appears as WEIGHT variable in tc CLI minimal output

form.2013-2016: not used in filing unit tax calculations

PT_SSTB_income.desc: Value of one implies business income is from a specified service trade or business (SSTB); value of zero implies business income is from a qualified trade or business

PT_binc_w2_wages.desc: Filing unit's share of total W-2 wages paid by the pass-through business

PT_ubia_property.desc: Filing unit's share of total business property owned by the pass-through business

niit.desc: Net Investment Income Tax from Form 8960

combined.desc: Sum of iitax and payrolltax and lumpsum_tax

earned.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

earned_p.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

earned_s.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

was_plus_sey_p.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

was_plus_sey_s.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

rptc.desc: Refundable Payroll Tax Credit for filing unit

rptc_p.desc: Refundable Payroll Tax Credit for taxpayer

rptc_s.desc: Refundable Payroll Tax Credit for spouse

exact.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

expanded_income.desc: Broad income measure that includes benefit_value_total

iitax.desc: Total federal individual income tax liability; appears as INCTAX variable in tc CLI minimal output

num.desc: 2 when MARS is 2 (married filing jointly); otherwise 1

othertaxes.desc: Other taxes: sum of niit, e09700, e09800 and e09900 (included in c09200)

payrolltax.desc: Total (employee + employer) payroll tax liability; appears as PAYTAX variable in tc CLI minimal output (payrolltax = ptax_was)

sep.desc: 2 when MARS is 3 (married filing separately); otherwise 1

sey.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

surtax.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

taxbc.desc: Regular tax on regular taxable income before credits

c01000.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

c02500.desc: Social security (OASDI) benefits included in AGI

c02900.desc: Total of all 'above the line' income adjustments to get AGI

c03260.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

c04470.desc: Itemized deductions after phase-out (zero for non-itemizers)

c05200.desc: Tax amount from Sch X,Y,Z tables

c05700.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

c05800.desc: Total (regular + AMT) income tax liability before credits (equals taxbc plus c09600)

c07100.desc: Total non-refundable credits used to reduce positive tax liability

c32800.desc: Child and dependent care expenses capped by policy (not by earnings)

c07180.desc: Nonrefundable credit for child and dependent care expenses from Form 2441

CDCC_refund.desc: Refundable credit for child and dependent care expenses from Form 2441

c07200.desc: Schedule R credit for the elderly and the disabled

c07230.desc: Education tax credits non-refundable amount from Form 8863 (includes c87668)

c07240.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

c07260.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

c07300.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

c07400.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

c07600.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

c08000.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

c09200.desc: Income tax liability (including othertaxes) after non-refundable credits are used, but before refundable credits are applied

c10960.desc: American Opportunity Credit refundable amount from Form 8863

c17000.desc: Sch A: Medical expenses deducted (component of pre-limitation c21060 total)

c18300.desc: Sch A: State and local taxes plus real estate taxes deducted (component of pre-limitation c21060 total)

c19200.desc: Sch A: Interest deducted (component of pre-limitation c21060 total)

c19700.desc: Sch A: Charity contributions deducted (component of pre-limitation c21060 total)

c20500.desc: Sch A: Net casualty or theft loss deducted (component of pre-limitation c21060 total)

c20800.desc: Sch A: Net limited miscellaneous deductions deducted (component of pre-limitation c21060 total)

c21040.desc: Itemized deductions that are phased out

c21060.desc: Itemized deductions before phase-out (zero for non-itemizers)

c23650.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

c59660.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

c87668.desc: American Opportunity Credit non-refundable amount from Form 8863 (included in c07230)

care_deduction.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

ctc_new.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

ctc_total.desc: Total CTC amount (c07220 + c11070 + odc + ctc_new)

ctc_nonrefundable.desc: Portion of total CTC amount that is nonrefundable

ctc_refundable.desc: Portion of total CTC amount that is refundable

recovery_rebate_credit.desc: Recovery Rebate Credit, from American Rescue Plan Act of 2021

dwks10.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

dwks13.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

dwks14.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

dwks19.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

dwks43.desc: separate tax on long-term capital gains and qualified dividends

fstax.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

invinc_agi_ec.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

invinc_ec_base.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

lumpsum_tax.desc: Lumpsum (or head) tax; appears as LSTAX variable in tc CLI minimal output

codtc_limited.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

ptax_amc.desc: Additional Medicare Tax from Form 8959 (included in othertaxes and iitax)

ptax_oasdi.desc: Employee + employer OASDI FICA tax plus self-employment tax

ptax_was.desc: Employee + employer OASDI + HI FICA tax

setax.desc: Self-employment tax (included in othertaxes and iitax)

ymod.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

ymod1.desc: search taxcalc/calcfunctions.py for how calculated and used

ubi.desc: Universal Basic Income benefit for filing unit

taxable_ubi.desc: Amount of UBI benefit included in AGI

nontaxable_ubi.desc: Amount of UBI benefit excluded from AGI

mtr_paytax.desc: Marginal payroll tax rate (in percentage terms) on extra taxpayer earnings (e00200p)

mtr_inctax.desc: Marginal income tax rate (in percentage terms) on extra taxpayer earnings (e00200p)

aftertax_income.desc: After tax income is equal to expanded_income minus combined

benefit_cost_total.desc: Government cost of all benefits received by tax unit

benefit_value_total.desc: Consumption value of all benefits received by tax unit, which is included in expanded_income
